009package GenericFilterDemos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.Convolver;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015
016public class Filter_Demo_A implements PlugInFilter {
017        
018        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
019                return DOES_ALL;                                // works for any type of image!
020        }
021
022        public void run(ImageProcessor I) {
023                float[] H = {                                                   // coefficient array H is one-dimensional!
024                        0.075f, 0.125f, 0.075f,
025                        0.125f, 0.200f, 0.125f,
026                        0.075f, 0.125f, 0.075f };
027
028                Convolver cv = new Convolver();
029                cv.setNormalize(false);                 // turn off kernel normalization
030                cv.convolve(I, H, 3, 3);                // apply the filter H to I
031        }
032}
